channel.title: Trading Research on Theoretical Explorations
channel.description: Recent content in Trading Research on Theoretical Explorations

item.title: The Three Planes of Market Observation
item.description: How different observational planes reveal different aspects of market structure, and why most traders get stuck viewing price in only one dimension

item.title: The Journey Into Market Microstructure: What We Discovered About Trading Systems
item.description: Starting with a 33% win rate MA crossover strategy on gold, this research revealed something unexpected about how markets actually work.
